verses.name: Jeremiah 13:20
verses.text: Lift up your eyes, and behold them that come from the north: where is the flock that was given thee, thy beautiful flock?

verses.name: Jeremiah 13:21
verses.text: What wilt thou say when he shall punish thee? for thou hast taught them to be captains, and as chief over thee: shall not sorrows take thee, as a woman in travail?

verses.name: Jeremiah 13:22
verses.text: And if thou say in thine heart, Wherefore come these things upon me? For the greatness of thine iniquity are thy skirts discovered, and thy heels made bare.
